title: Fact check: A fake Trudeau letter and other false claims about Canadian protests swirl on social media - CNN
content:
1. Fact check: A fake Trudeau letter and other false claims about Canadian protests swirl on social media  CNN
  2. Independent journalist writes 'what the truckers want' following 100 Freedom Convoy interviews  Fox News
  3. Department of Homeland Security warns of trucker protests in the U.S.  WFAA
  4. Opinion | The Ottawa Trucker Protests Are a Test of Democracy  The New York Times
  5. Opinion | Canadian 'Freedom Convoy' surges beyond legitimate protest  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: On Wednesday, we debunked a bunch of false claims about the ongoing Canadian protests against vaccine mandates, Covid-19 restrictions and the Liberal government of Prime Minister Justin Trudeau.
